website_summaries.verdict: An innovative mattress by Casper that provides the best of both worlds – multiple layers of foam and springs for structured support.
pros: In addition to 4 layers of foam, the hybrid mattress by Casper has inner springs for extra support
Also has open-cell foams that help keep you cool while you sleep
A great choice for consumers who prefer a little extra support
Mattress' memory foam distributes weight nicely and alleviates pain and pressure
cons: Although the mattress adjusts to body contours, it may be too firm for some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Don’t but it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a King and it is 6” too small. Also it feels like a crib mattress. You can feel each spring and it’s terribly uncomfortable. Definitely NOT a $1300 mattress. We will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Better than Sleep Number!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars across the board because I feel there is always room for improvement. That being said this thing is awesome! It does take a week-ish for the chemical smell to go away, but this thing is very comfy. We just came off of a cSE sleep number bed, that felt good for the first 5min after laying down....then never being comfortable again that night. It cost 2x what this Casper did....lesson learned. We love this mattress. Its a huge improvement over sleep number. This mattress does sleep warmer than the sleep number. I am a hot sleeper, but this casper is still not as offputting as the sleep number was. Thanks Casper!
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: There are some obvious problems with it but I don't plan on getting rid of it anytime soon. It's supposed to be a 12"height but it lines up perfectly with my wife's 10"mattress from sealy. Its comfortable but the foam isnt as dense as most. Cheap tho
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hubbsy

customer_reviews.title: A good hybrid mattress, but there may be better ones
customer_reviews.text: The kid loves it especially in light of his previous lousy traditional mattress. What I have some hesitation to praise about tis that the mattress is a bit too bouncy. Some may like it, but I do not. I will wait until when the weather is hot and see if this mattress traps too much heat. My wife and I bought Amerisleep (two twins), and they are just wonderful! Of course they are more expensive (by $150-200) since they are made in Indiana (or somewhere in Middle America).
customer_reviews.author: nonames

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous chemical smell !!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all love the mattress but......it has the most horrendous chemical smell!!!! We have had it open now for 4 days and it is not dissipating. My bedding wreaks, my pj's wreak and my pillows also stink. Does anyone have a solution to this problem? If so email it to me PLEASE!!!! (dave-zed@charter.net) Like I said it is super comfy and my aches and pains are gone but the smell..YUCK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy zanatta

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but still smells like chemicals weeks later
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is comfortable and the shipping was easy. It smells so much like chemicals though! I’ve had it for over a month and it’s still off gassing to the point that I feel nauseous when I peal back my covers to lay in bed. Im not sure how much more I can take if this.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Return Policy
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is hot!!! I wake up pouring sweat every morning and needing another shower. My husband who is always cold said he had difficulty sleeping because it's too hot. I called CASPER to request a return and was told if I purchased via Amazon that their return policy would not be in effect and to utilize the AMAZON return policy. Tried that but I will have to lug a very heavy mattress to my nearest UPS store
customer_reviews.author: Amanda James

customer_reviews.title: Bad back this is way too soft, it hurts
customer_reviews.text: This may work for a young person with no back problems but not me. It is way too soft and lacks support
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: Still smells bad after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: When we first received the mattress and removed it from its plastic bag, the solvent smell coming from the mattress was oppressive, causing a headache and sore throat from just being in the same room as the mattress. After three days with the bedroom windows wide open and nothing on the mattress, the smell was bearable, but still unpleasant. Now, six weeks after receiving it, the smell is only noticeable if the bedroom door has been closed for a couple of hours. On the bright side, it is relatively comfortable, at least, with a memory-foam pad on top of the mattress. I won't be sending it back, but I don't think I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bach

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to compare it with
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I could have done better or not. I wanted this mattress because I am a warm, restless sleeper. I did not want a mattress that I would "sink" into. This one meets that criteria. I did think from reviews that it might be a bit softer than it is. But it gives me good support and I do not have any issues that are major enough to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: V. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Casper!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Casper mattress for our oceanfront rental condo. Our mattress needed to be replaced and our clients expect a higher end product. This mattress has not disappointed anyone! We've had rave reviews from everyone! We're very happy with our choice of mattresses!
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Completely In Love
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for a few months now. We went with this one because of the springs to help with the longevity of support since straight memory foam tends to leave indents after a while. Let me say this has helped my husband so much! His back hurts less and he gets better sleep. He goes to bed much earlier then I do so I don't wake him up when I go to bed either. It's firm enough not to sink but soft enough to feel luxurious. The only downfall right now is the mattress cover doesn't hold the fitted sheet well so I have to pull it back down almost every morning.
customer_reviews.author: RQ

customer_reviews.title: Return due to back pain
customer_reviews.text: The first week I loved the mattress. Then it suddenly was very soft. I'm a back sleeper so the softness was really hurting my back to the point I was dreading going to bed. I had no choice but to return it.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: It is no where the mattress I expected. It is HIGH and Hard in the middle, and so soft at each end. When you roll over you feel like you are going to fall out of bed, it is so high and hard in the middle and so low on each edge. I'm 80 years old and have more back pain from this mattress than any other I have ever had. When you think of a Casper you think of a good mattress, not so with the one I received. 1 to 10, maybe a 1.
customer_reviews.author: John76

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are accurate enough, cant go wrong with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress does not really feel pain relieving at initial sleeping, but i wake up every morning with 80% less back pain than I did my original worn out mattress (obviously). Hybrid version, i want to try out the full foam version but dont want to keep switching if it doesnt work out, if thats even possible. Overall satisfied with quality, functionality, and price.
customer_reviews.author: nunyo

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied - great product!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised - great for apartments but also great/convenient for use in any type of home. Nice quality - super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Christie

customer_reviews.title: If you can tolerate the musty odor than this mattress is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: My first mattress came with a musty odor. I tried to air it out for a week and treat with febreze , to no avail. But no problem, the company shipped me a second one (I have to dispose of the bad mattress because they don’t pick it up). The second one also has a musty odor but more tolerable. Now, that being said, I love the comfort of the mattress. I no longer have aches or pains in my hips. So... is it worth it?
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress. So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Casper mattress for 1 1/2 months now and I love it. I gave it the full 48 hours to expand before I used it and have been getting excellent sleep. I only wish I would of got it in King size instead of Queen. It wasn’t that much more price difference I just didn’t think I had enough space to fit in my room. I would recommend this mattress for anyone on the fence about purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: AL L

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. I waited 2 months before posting a review and this bed is extremely comfortable. Was sold on a cooling system and I don’t know if the hybrid really makes any difference from a cooling standpoint. As a former professional athlete I value sleep highly and believe it is one of the most important investments you can make. Love this bed.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest!!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sleep in years, most definitely better than my old box spring and mattress. My dog and cat concur, we all sleep thru the night
customer_reviews.author: cathleen Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: More support and comfort than expected. Hit the jackpot with this one. Very difficult to buy a mattress online. In fact this was a first. Reviews were a help, and it all worked out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Vegabon

customer_reviews.title: A ghostly good night sleep
customer_reviews.text: Dealing with severe low back pain. This mattress has provided the support and comfort I have long needed. Wife thinks it is a little firm for her but a full two thumbs up from me!
customer_reviews.author: Your Brother Man

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few months now, and I love it! It is very comfortable, and I can tell that I am sleeping better/more deeply. Coming in a box wasn't an issue, and it was nice having it delivered straight to our home without going to a store. It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy bed but has chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy bed but the smell of the chemical (from the gel?) is still there even it has been more than 1 month that we have been using it
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: Really a great bed.
customer_reviews.text: We love the gentle firmness of this bed. We live full time in a RV. The bed that came with it was too soft. This bed is perfect. It is a little shocking how it is packed, but it is perfect when unpacked.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Good not the best
customer_reviews.text: This was my 3rd try at buying a bed. I am keeping the Casper Hybrid. I did have to put a 3" gel foam on top. I'm comfortable now however it does sleep a bit hot. I bought Bamboo cooling sheets and that helps.
customer_reviews.author: TERRY KAISER

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Going on for 3 months now and no divots like our previous, far more expensive mattress. I sleep in the exact same spot that the wife, sometimes daughter and dog allow. It’s a California King but I’m only allotted about 4 square inches of edge space. I’ve been sleeping a lot better now too.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Daoedsjah

customer_reviews.title: A nice mattress and helped my back pain.
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable and definitely helped my back pain and sciatica. But I dont feel it lives up to the cooking aspect. Actually it feels warmer instead of cooling that I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: David Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Good feeling to lay on
customer_reviews.text: Feels good, does not sink much at all. It seems not to over heat you on hot days, very happy with the way it stays stiff enough not to make you feel like your sagging into it!
customer_reviews.author: Corey E. Tyner

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff mattress
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is not comfortable, it’s stiff and feels like a crib mattress. I spent over 500 dollars on this mattress and it’s surely not worth it. Now I have to spend more money to place a topper on the mattress. I’m very disappointed and out of money.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Mainwaring

customer_reviews.title: Cozy up with Casper
customer_reviews.text: We love our Casper. There's time where I don't even want to get up because it is super comfortable and cozy. When I do think about sleep after a long day, I am so glad to know I can go home to my Casper!
customer_reviews.author: Joeann

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Mattress - Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite mattress we've ever had. Fantastic night's sleep for my picky husband and me! You can't feel the other person tossing and turning at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: One of the easiest things ever. Order, it shows up, easy to move, take it out of the box, done. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Courtenay M. Daumeyer

customer_reviews.title: Casper is the best!
customer_reviews.text: We Love our new Casper bed! It came quickly, was soooo easy to set up, and we've slept really well ever since the first night. There was no adjustment period for us, we were happy about that. We wouldn't hesitate to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sandaltoes

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. Will continue review after I sleep on it!
customer_reviews.author: Biancanne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress ever, so easy to un box, and no more back pain!! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crawford

customer_reviews.title: A but softer than I'd hoped, but still pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and comfortable, I'm sleeping very well. The mattress is a but softer than I'd hoped, but I'm still satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: SEP

customer_reviews.title: Tis like being a 👻.
customer_reviews.text: The initial smell. I expected it. A few days and was fine.
customer_reviews.author: randy j. cunningham

customer_reviews.title: The Casper Hybrid is a must have for a good nights rest if you stuffer from aches and pains.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his casper. He says it contours to his body.
customer_reviews.author: Child Please

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping better!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little getting used to. The edges are not reinforced so if you like to sleep up against the side of the mattress you might have to adjust. Slide to the center a little and it’s a comfortable sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Morlando

customer_reviews.title: Unwavering comfort
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase!!!! If you have difficulty getting comfortable, this is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Susanna M Bria

customer_reviews.title: too soft
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mattress at first but the longer I slept on it the more uncomfortable it became. Too soft to help my sore back. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: SJE

customer_reviews.title: It has lived up to its reputation it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It has lived up to its reputation it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: PivotalGG

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I went with this bed instead of the standard lower cost option. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rhines

100 night trial and free returns within 100 days of receipt of shipment on products sold by Casper on Original Hybrid 2019
